game.name: Songs of Syx
game.genres: 캐주얼, 인디, 시뮬레이션, 전략, 앞서 해보기
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, Steam 창작마당, Steam Cloud, 레벨 에디터 포함, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Songs of Syx is a fantasy city-builder with vast battles simulating thousands of citizens and soldiers. Start off as a small village and build, scheme, and fight your way towards a mighty empire. The mechanics are deep and true to life, where tiny events can spiral into the collapse of kingdoms.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Songs of Syx is a fantasy city-builder with vast battles simulating thousands of citizens and soldiers. Start off as a small village and build, scheme, and fight your way towards a mighty empire. The mechanics are deep and true to life, where tiny events can spiral into the collapse of kingdoms.

reviewHighlights.text: 림월드를 좋아한다? 심시티를 좋아한다? 매너로드를 좋아한다? 필구. 그래픽은 도트그래픽이지만 게임성이 씹어먹는 게임 한글화도 진행하고 있다! 나 혼자지만...
초반에 존나 막막한데 그냥 하다보면 어찌저찌 됨, 대신 초반에 동선 생각안하고 짓다가 후반부에 부랄탁치면서 이 좆같은 도시 누가 만들었냐 스스로 자아성찰하게되는 게임
